name: Standard Meeting
description: General meetings with overview, decisions, and action items

sections.title: Overview
sections.instruction: Provide a brief 2-3 sentence summary of the meeting's purpose and outcome

sections.title: Participants
sections.instruction: List people who actively spoke in the meeting

sections.title: Discussion Areas
sections.instruction: Identify main topics discussed with analysis

sections.title: Key Points
sections.instruction: Extract the most important points and decisions made

sections.title: Action Items
sections.instruction: List action items with assignees and deadlines if mentioned
